law.catch_line: In §§ 10-302 through 10-309 of this subtitle, the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In §§ 10-302 through 10-309 of this subtitle, the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Specimen of blood" and "1 specimen of blood" have the meaning stated in § 16-205.1 of the Transportation Article.
"Test" has the meaning stated in § 16-205.1 of the Transportation Article.
